title: compiler should check size of channel's type
body:
Send a value larger than 64K down a channel and it hangs.
Demo code attached.

Given that elemsize is defined as uint16 in runtime/chan.c,
(and this seems like a reasonable limit), why not have the
compiler give an error if this happens?

Which revision are you sync'ed to?
